content:
A helicopter tour over Na Pali Coast sounds like an incredible experience! I'm happy to help with recommendations and tips.

However, I have to clarify again that I'm an AI, I don't recall previous conversations, so I didn't know about your outdoor adventures in Yosemite or the Lost Coast Trail. But I'm excited to help you plan your Kauai adventure!

Please let me know if you have any questions about helicopter tour operators, what to expect on the tour, or any other tips and recommendations. I'm here to help!
